Completion: Good start—please add one more different reason (a few words).
Thanks—give one more distinct reason (a few words).
Clarify: Please make that more concrete (a few words).
Could you be more specific (a few words)?
Mechanism: In one sentence, briefly explain the path from cause to result.
One sentence: how would this lead to that?
Alternative: Give one fundamentally different explanation (a few words).
Name a second, different way the link could arise (few words).
Boundary: Name a condition under which your conclusion would no longer hold (few words).
